doc:
Tom Tyler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Tyler 0 Tom Tyler (born Vincent Markowski, August 9, 1903 – May 3, 1954) was an American actor known for his leading roles in low-budget Western films in the silent and sound eras, and for his portrayal of superhero Captain Marvel in the 1941 serial film The Adventures of Captain Marvel. Tyler also played the mummy in 1940's The Mummy's Hand, a popular Universal Studios monster film. Tom_Tyler ( born Vincent_Markowski , August_9_,_1903 – May_3_,_1954 ) was an_American_actor known for his_leading_roles in low-budget_Western_films in the_silent_and_sound_eras , and for his_portrayal of superhero_Captain_Marvel in the_1941_serial_film The_Adventures of Captain_Marvel . Tyler also played the_mummy in 1940 's The_Mummy 's_Hand , a_popular_Universal_Studios_monster_film .
